name: The Threadbare Slippers of Vingt Cinq
data: It increases the users wisdom phenomenally.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
The slippers can be inlaid with up to three shards.
The slippers amplify the weft of healing and protective magics.
